DataElement.preferredDefinition: A textual description of the hearing devise used.

Property.preferredDefinition: Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Devices that are used to enhance hearing._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

PermissibleValues.value: I use an FM system in class

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.: A room or space, especially in a school, where classes are held.: A wireless electronic device designed to transmit sound to an individual and help them to hear better, especially in noisy environments. Some FM systems can transmit directly to a listener's hearing aids while others use speakers or headphones.

Concepts.definition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.
A room or space, especially in a school, where classes are held.
A wireless electronic device designed to improve hearing, especially in noisy environments, by transmitting sound over a distance from a microphone to a receiver using radio waves.

PermissibleValues.value: I wear ONE hearing aid in my RIGHT ear

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: The organ of hearing located on the right side of the head.: A battery-powered electronic device designed to improve hearing. Most are worn in or behind the ear.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
The organ of hearing located on the right side of the head.
A battery-powered electronic device designed to improve hearing. Most are worn in or behind the ear.

PermissibleValues.value: I wear ONE hearing aid in my LEFT ear

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: The organ of hearing located on the left side of the head.: A battery-powered electronic device designed to improve hearing. Most are worn in or behind the ear.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
The organ of hearing located on the left side of the head.
A battery-powered electronic device designed to improve hearing. Most are worn in or behind the ear.

PermissibleValues.value: I wear ONE cochlear implant in my RIGHT ear

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: The organ of hearing located on the right side of the head.: A two part electronic device with one part that is implanted under the skin with wires that connect to the cochlea, and an external portion that receives the sound. It is for individuals with severe hearing impairment.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
The organ of hearing located on the right side of the head.

A two part electronic device with one part that is implanted under the skin with wires that connect to the cochlea, and an external portion that receives the sound. It is for individuals with severe hearing impairment.

PermissibleValues.value: I wear ONE cochlear implant in my LEFT ear

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: The organ of hearing located on the left side of the head.: A two part electronic device with one part that is implanted under the skin with wires that connect to the cochlea, and an external portion that receives the sound. It is for individuals with severe hearing impairment.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
The organ of hearing located on the left side of the head.

A two part electronic device with one part that is implanted under the skin with wires that connect to the cochlea, and an external portion that receives the sound. It is for individuals with severe hearing impairment.
